levels.description: Expends all stored attack charges and summons <@ba.vup>stored attack charges +1</> Old Day Remnants on deployable tiles within Attack Range (lasts for 30 seconds). The Remnants activate when enemies approach, each dealing <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Arts damage to nearby enemies and dragging them towards itself <@ba.vup>moderately</>
